【中文】  
本課程是教育哲學與/或教育史領域初階課程。本課程旨在培養研究生批判性閱讀學術文本的習慣。本課程主要有三項目標，課程將圍繞三個主題。首先是回顧教育哲學與/或教育史學科的歷史發展；其次是探討教育哲學與/或教育史的研究方法。為此，第三個目標是挑選經典文本以供批判性閱讀與討論。大體上，修習本課程的研究生期待能學習如何哲學性地與/或史學性地閱讀、討論與書寫教育論文。  
【英文】  
This course is a beginning course in the field of philosophy of education (POE for short) and/or history of education (HOE for short). It is aimed to cultivate the graduate student’s habit of reading academic materials critically. Specifically, it has three objectives and the course will be structured around the three themes. Firstly, it is aimed to review the historical development of the discipline(s) of POE or/and HOE. Secondly, the research methods of POE and/or HOE will be investigated. And finally, some classic works of POE and/or HOE will be selected for critically reading and discussion. On the whole, graduate students taking the course are expected to learn how to read, discuss and write educational papers philosophically and/or historically.
